record.title: This is how it happened
As Sucedi
record.creator: Francisco Jose de Goya y Lucientes
record.location: Ann Arbor (MI,USA), University of Michigan Museum of Art
record.subject: war
record.description: This is how it happened is No. 47 (33) from the series "The Disasters of War", 4th edition, plates for the series ca. 1810-14, 1820, 4th edition was published 1906.
